segue_the_chain: The Kinks’ Ray Davies was once in a relationship with Chrissie Hynde who wrote the next track…

segue_dave.line: The Kinks arranged their record "The Kinks Are the Village Green Preservation Society", and Dave Davies performed vocals on the same record...
segue_dave.explanation: The Kinks arranged the record The Kinks Are the Village Green Preservation Society and Dave Davies performed vocals on the record The Kinks Are the Village Green Preservation Society
